Title: Justice Is Blind
Plot: Gob steals a file on the government's case against the Bluth Company that Maggie had given to Michael. Tobias is sent to Maggie's house to get evidence, George Michael tries to prove Maeby's fraud, and Lindsay fights to remove the Ten Commandments from the courthouse lawn.
GuestStars: Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Ping Wu, Timothy Davis-Reed
